note: Illustrator, Graphic Designer and fine artist from Vienna, Austria I love comics, old folk music instruments, good food, video games and mushroom hunting.  I'm currently reclaiming my versatility in art and switch between styles and mediums frequently, since I like to experience different visual worlds while creating (even if algorithms taught us differently).  Welcome to my creative lair!
